```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggseg)

library(ggplot2)
```

## R Markdown

Modified version of the test

Random data

```{r}
someData <- tibble(
  region = rep(c("parahippocampal", "medial orbitofrontal"), 2), 
  p = sample(seq(0,.5,.001), 4),
  groups = c(rep("g1", 2), rep("g2", 2))
)
```

Example visualization:

```{r}
someData %>%
  group_by(groups) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_brain(atlas = dk, 
             position = position_brain(hemi ~ side),
             aes(fill = p)) +
  facet_wrap(~groups) + scale_fill_viridis() +theme_minimal()
```

Example visualization:

```{r}
p <- ggseg3d(atlas = "aseg_3d") %>% 
  add_glassbrain(colour = "skyblue", opacity=0.5) %>% 
  remove_axes() %>% 
  pan_camera("right lateral")
p
```
